mapper.insert: insert into email (user_id,expi_dtm,email,certino) values (#{userId},DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3.5 MINUTE),#{email},#{certino})
mapper.select: select expi_dtm from email where user_id = #{userId} order by expi_dtm DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM email WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND certino = #{certino});
